title: How Many Carbs!? Inside the Monumental Menus That Fuel Tour of Flanders, Paris-Roubaix, and Cycling’s Cruelest Classics
content:
Kilos of rice, dozens of gels, multiple recovery meals: How riders power the 7,000-calorie churn of the cobblestone classics.

Read the full article at How Many Carbs!? Inside the Monumental Menus That Fuel Tour of Flanders, Paris-Roubaix, and Cycling’s Cruelest Classics on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
